summary.span: 一个专用的 ，提供建立有两种结果的条件节点模型的能力。

span.span: A specialized that provides the ability to model a conditional node with two outcomes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用条件并定义要执行的条件是如果操作`true`或`false`。 uses a condition and defines actions to take if the condition is `true` or `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 节点。The following code sample demonstrates creating a node. 此示例摘自[故障处理中流程图活动使用 TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md)示例。This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample. summary.span: 指定 正在测试的条件。

span.span: Specifies the condition the is testing.
A value expression that represents the condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果条件计算结果为`true`、中执行属性。If the condition evaluates to `true`, the in the property is executed. 否则，执行 属性中的 。Otherwise the in the property is executed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 节点的 Condition 属性。The following code sample demonstrates using the Condition property of a node. 此示例摘自[故障处理中流程图活动使用 TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md)示例。This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
